_description: ‘Passio apostolorum Simonis et Iude’ (version in short lines)

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Simon and saint Iudassamyn playnly gan þai pas…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …and þare þai lif in lastand blisall weldan god þeder vs wis
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Hic incipit passio Apostolorum Simonis Et Iude (rubric, f. 181va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 138-42.
